alloy_db_proxy_icn.description:
AlloyDBProxyIcn is the AlloyDB instance's connection name, typically in
 the format "projects/project-name/locations/region/clusters/cluster/instances/instance".
 If set, the database will be dialed via the proxy.

cloud_sql_proxy_icn.description:
CloudSqlProxyIcn is the Cloud SQL instance's connection name, typically in
 the format "project-name:region:instance-name". If set, the database will
 be dialed via the proxy.

dsn.description:
Dsn is the data source name or database URL used to configure connections
 to the database.
